original_text: This is how you should think about us, who are leaders in the church. We are Christ's servants. God has also given a special job to us. We must explain his message to people so that they understand it. Corinthians 3 Corinthians 5
korean_text: 사람이 마땅히 우리를 그리스도의 일꾼이요 하나님의 비밀을 맡은 자로 여길지어다

sentences.original_text: This is how you should think about us
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 당신이 우리에 대해 생각해야 할 방식입니다

sentences.original_text: who are leaders in the church
God has also given a special job to us
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 또한 우리에게 특별한 직책을 주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: We must explain his message to people
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 사람들에게 그의 메시지를 설명해야 합니다
